Uses of Package
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus

Packages that use org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus
Package
Description
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web.workload.brokers
 
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus
 
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.disk
 
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web.workload.brokers
    Class
    Description
    DatacenterBrokerEX
    An extension to the default broker, which allows (i) VM destruction; (ii) definition of events prior to simulation start, which are fired later on; (iii) predefined "life length" of the broker; (iv) billing.
    IAutoscalingPolicy
    An autoscaling policy, which scales up/down the allocated cloud resources.
    MonitoringBorkerEX
    A broker which measures the utilisation of its VMs.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus
    Class
    Description
    DatacenterBrokerEX
    An extension to the default broker, which allows (i) VM destruction; (ii) definition of events prior to simulation start, which are fired later on; (iii) predefined "life length" of the broker; (iv) billing.
    DatacenterBrokerEX.PresetEvent
    CloudSim does not execute events that are fired before the simulation has started.
    IAutoscalingPolicy
    An autoscaling policy, which scales up/down the allocated cloud resources.
    MonitoringBorkerEX
    A broker which measures the utilisation of its VMs.
    VmSchedulerWithIndependentPes
    A VmScheduler which associates each VM with one or several PEs.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.disk
    Class
    Description
    DatacenterEX
    Extended datacenter, that allows for VM booting delays to be modeled.
    VmSchedulerWithIndependentPes
    A VmScheduler which associates each VM with one or several PEs.
